5254#if defined(FEAT_CRYPT) || defined(PROTO)
5255/*
5256 * If "data" points to a data block encrypt the text in it and return a copy
5257 * in allocated memory. Return NULL when out of memory.
5258 * Otherwise return "data".
5259 */
5260 char_u *
5261ml_encrypt_data(
5262 memfile_T *mfp,
5263 char_u *data,
5264 off_T offset,
5265 unsigned size)
5266{
5267 DATA_BL *dp = (DATA_BL *)data;
5268 char_u *head_end;
5269 char_u *text_start;
5270 char_u *new_data;
5271 int text_len;
5272 cryptstate_T *state;
5273
5274 if (dp->db_id != DATA_ID(('d' << 8) + 'a'))
5275 return data;
5276
5277 state = ml_crypt_prepare(mfp, offset, FALSE0);
5278 if (state == NULL((void*)0))
5279 return data;
5280
5281 new_data = alloc(size);
5282 if (new_data == NULL((void*)0))
5283 return NULL((void*)0);
5284 head_end = (char_u *)(&dp->db_index[dp->db_line_count]);
5285 text_start = (char_u *)dp + dp->db_txt_start;
5286 text_len = size - dp->db_txt_start;
5287
5288 // Copy the header and the text.
5289 mch_memmove(new_data, dp, head_end - (char_u *)dp)memmove((char *)(new_data), (char *)(dp), head_end - (char_u *
)dp);
5290
5291 // Encrypt the text.
5292 crypt_encode(state, text_start, text_len, new_data + dp->db_txt_start);
5293 crypt_free_state(state);
5294
5295 // Clear the gap.
5296 if (head_end < text_start)
5297 vim_memset(new_data + (head_end - data), 0, text_start - head_end)memset((new_data + (head_end - data)), (0), (text_start - head_end
));
5298
5299 return new_data;
5300}
5301
5302/*
5303 * Decrypt the text in "data" if it points to an encrypted data block.
5304 */
5305 void
5306ml_decrypt_data(
5307 memfile_T *mfp,
5308 char_u *data,
5309 off_T offset,
5310 unsigned size)
5311{
5312 DATA_BL *dp = (DATA_BL *)data;
5313 char_u *head_end;
5314 char_u *text_start;
5315 int text_len;
5316 cryptstate_T *state;
5317
5318 if (dp->db_id == DATA_ID(('d' << 8) + 'a'))
5319 {
5320 head_end = (char_u *)(&dp->db_index[dp->db_line_count]);
5321 text_start = (char_u *)dp + dp->db_txt_start;
5322 text_len = dp->db_txt_end - dp->db_txt_start;
5323
5324 if (head_end > text_start || dp->db_txt_start > size
5325 || dp->db_txt_end > size)
5326 return; // data was messed up
5327
5328 state = ml_crypt_prepare(mfp, offset, TRUE1);
5329 if (state != NULL((void*)0))
5330 {
5331 // Decrypt the text in place.
5332 crypt_decode_inplace(state, text_start, text_len);
5333 crypt_free_state(state);
5334 }
5335 }
5336}
5337
5338/*
5339 * Prepare for encryption/decryption, using the key, seed and offset.
5340 * Return an allocated cryptstate_T *.
5341 */
5342 static cryptstate_T *
5343ml_crypt_prepare(memfile_T *mfp, off_T offset, int reading)
5344{
5345 buf_T *buf = mfp->mf_buffer;
5346 char_u salt[50];
5347 int method_nr;
5348 char_u *key;
5349 char_u *seed;
5350
5351 if (reading && mfp->mf_old_key != NULL((void*)0))
5352 {
5353 // Reading back blocks with the previous key/method/seed.
5354 method_nr = mfp->mf_old_cm;
5355 key = mfp->mf_old_key;
5356 seed = mfp->mf_old_seed;
5357 }
5358 else
5359 {
5360 method_nr = crypt_get_method_nr(buf);
5361 key = buf->b_p_key;
5362 seed = mfp->mf_seed;
5363 }
5364 if (*key == NUL'\000')
5365 return NULL((void*)0);
5366
5367 if (method_nr == CRYPT_M_ZIP0)
5368 {
5369 // For PKzip: Append the offset to the key, so that we use a different
5370 // key for every block.
5371 vim_snprintf((char *)salt, sizeof(salt), "%s%ld", key, (long)offset);
5372 return crypt_create(method_nr, salt, NULL((void*)0), 0, NULL((void*)0), 0);
5373 }
5374
5375 // Using blowfish or better: add salt and seed. We use the byte offset
5376 // of the block for the salt.
5377 vim_snprintf((char *)salt, sizeof(salt), "%ld", (long)offset);
5378 return crypt_create(method_nr, key, salt, (int)STRLEN(salt)strlen((char *)(salt)),
5379 seed, MF_SEED_LEN8);
5380}
5381
5382#endif

5385#if defined(FEAT_BYTEOFF) || defined(PROTO)
5386
5387#define MLCS_MAXL800 800 // max no of lines in chunk
5388#define MLCS_MINL400 400 // should be half of MLCS_MAXL
5389
5390/*
5391 * Keep information for finding byte offset of a line, updtype may be one of:
5392 * ML_CHNK_ADDLINE: Add len to parent chunk, possibly splitting it
5393 * Careful: ML_CHNK_ADDLINE may cause ml_find_line() to be called.
5394 * ML_CHNK_DELLINE: Subtract len from parent chunk, possibly deleting it
5395 * ML_CHNK_UPDLINE: Add len to parent chunk, as a signed entity.
5396 */
5397 static void
5398ml_updatechunk(
5399 buf_T *buf,
5400 linenr_T line,
5401 long len,
5402 int updtype)
5403{
5404 static buf_T *ml_upd_lastbuf = NULL((void*)0);
5405 static linenr_T ml_upd_lastline;
5406 static linenr_T ml_upd_lastcurline;
5407 static int ml_upd_lastcurix;
5408
5409 linenr_T curline = ml_upd_lastcurline;
5410 int curix = ml_upd_lastcurix;
5411 long size;
5412 chunksize_T *curchnk;
5413 int rest;
5414 bhdr_T *hp;
5415 DATA_BL *dp;
5416
5417 if (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks == -1 || len == 0)
5418 return;
5419 if (buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize == NULL((void*)0))
5420 {
5421 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize = ALLOC_MULT(chunksize_T, 100)(chunksize_T *)alloc(sizeof(chunksize_T) * (100));
5422 if (buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize == NULL((void*)0))
5423 {
5424 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks = -1;
5425 return;
5426 }
5427 buf->b_ml.ml_numchunks = 100;
5428 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks = 1;
5429 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[0].mlcs_numlines = 1;
5430 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[0].mlcs_totalsize = 1;
5431 }
5432
5433 if (updtype == ML_CHNK_UPDLINE3 && buf->b_ml.ml_line_count == 1)
5434 {
5435 /*
5436 * First line in empty buffer from ml_flush_line() -- reset
5437 */
5438 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks = 1;
5439 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[0].mlcs_numlines = 1;
5440 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[0].mlcs_totalsize = (long)buf->b_ml.ml_line_len;
5441 return;
5442 }
5443
5444 /*
5445 * Find chunk that our line belongs to, curline will be at start of the
5446 * chunk.
5447 */
5448 if (buf != ml_upd_lastbuf || line != ml_upd_lastline + 1
5449 || updtype != ML_CHNK_ADDLINE1)
5450 {
5451 for (curline = 1, curix = 0;
5452 curix < buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - 1
5453 && line >= curline + buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines;
5454 curix++)
5455 curline += buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines;
5456 }
5457 else if (curix < buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - 1
5458 && line >= curline + buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines)
5459 {
5460 // Adjust cached curix & curline
5461 curline += buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines;
5462 curix++;
5463 }
5464 curchnk = buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix;
5465
5466 if (updtype == ML_CHNK_DELLINE2)
5467 len = -len;
5468 curchnk->mlcs_totalsize += len;
5469 if (updtype == ML_CHNK_ADDLINE1)
5470 {
5471 curchnk->mlcs_numlines++;
5472
5473 // May resize here so we don't have to do it in both cases below
5474 if (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks + 1 >= buf->b_ml.ml_numchunks)
5475 {
5476 chunksize_T *t_chunksize = buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize;
5477
5478 buf->b_ml.ml_numchunks = buf->b_ml.ml_numchunks * 3 / 2;
5479 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize = vim_realloc(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize,realloc((buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize), (sizeof(chunksize_T) * buf
->b_ml.ml_numchunks))
5480 sizeof(chunksize_T) * buf->b_ml.ml_numchunks)realloc((buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize), (sizeof(chunksize_T) * buf
->b_ml.ml_numchunks));
5481 if (buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize == NULL((void*)0))
5482 {
5483 // Hmmmm, Give up on offset for this buffer
5484 vim_free(t_chunksize);
5485 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks = -1;
5486 return;
5487 }
5488 }
5489
5490 if (buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines >= MLCS_MAXL800)
5491 {
5492 int count; // number of entries in block
5493 int idx;
5494 int end_idx;
5495 int text_end;
5496 int linecnt;
5497
5498 mch_memmove(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1,memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (char
*)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T))
5499 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix,memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (char
*)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T))
5500 (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - curix) *memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (char
*)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T))
5501 sizeof(chunksize_T))memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (char
*)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T));
5502 // Compute length of first half of lines in the split chunk
5503 size = 0;
5504 linecnt = 0;
5505 while (curline < buf->b_ml.ml_line_count
5506 && linecnt < MLCS_MINL400)
5507 {
5508 if ((hp = ml_find_line(buf, curline, ML_FIND0x13)) == NULL((void*)0))
5509 {
5510 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks = -1;
5511 return;
5512 }
5513 dp = (DATA_BL *)(hp->bh_data);
5514 count = (long)(buf->b_ml.ml_locked_high) -
5515 (long)(buf->b_ml.ml_locked_low) + 1;
5516 idx = curline - buf->b_ml.ml_locked_low;
5517 curline = buf->b_ml.ml_locked_high + 1;
5518
5519 // compute index of last line to use in this MEMLINE
5520 rest = count - idx;
5521 if (linecnt + rest > MLCS_MINL400)
5522 {
5523 end_idx = idx + MLCS_MINL400 - linecnt - 1;
5524 linecnt = MLCS_MINL400;
5525 }
5526 else
5527 {
5528 end_idx = count - 1;
5529 linecnt += rest;
5530 }
5531#ifdef FEAT_PROP_POPUP
5532 if (buf->b_has_textprop)
5533 {
5534 int i;
5535
5536 // We cannot use the text pointers to get the text length,
5537 // the text prop info would also be counted. Go over the
5538 // lines.
5539 for (i = end_idx; i < idx; ++i)
5540 size += (int)STRLEN((char_u *)dp + (dp->db_index[i] & DB_INDEX_MASK))strlen((char *)((char_u *)dp + (dp->db_index[i] & (~((
unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1)))))) + 1;
5541 }
5542 else
5543#endif
5544 {
5545 if (idx == 0)// first line in block, text at the end
5546 text_end = dp->db_txt_end;
5547 else
5548 text_end = ((dp->db_index[idx - 1]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))));
5549 size += text_end - ((dp->db_index[end_idx]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))));
5550 }
5551 }
5552 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines = linecnt;
5553 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix + 1].mlcs_numlines -= linecnt;
5554 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_totalsize = size;
5555 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix + 1].mlcs_totalsize -= size;
5556 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks++;
5557 ml_upd_lastbuf = NULL((void*)0); // Force recalc of curix & curline
5558 return;
5559 }
5560 else if (buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines >= MLCS_MINL400
5561 && curix == buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - 1
5562 && buf->b_ml.ml_line_count - line <= 1)
5563 {
5564 /*
5565 * We are in the last chunk and it is cheap to crate a new one
5566 * after this. Do it now to avoid the loop above later on
5567 */
5568 curchnk = buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1;
5569 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks++;
5570 if (line == buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
5571 {
5572 curchnk->mlcs_numlines = 0;
5573 curchnk->mlcs_totalsize = 0;
5574 }
5575 else
5576 {
5577 /*
5578 * Line is just prior to last, move count for last
5579 * This is the common case when loading a new file
5580 */
5581 hp = ml_find_line(buf, buf->b_ml.ml_line_count, ML_FIND0x13);
5582 if (hp == NULL((void*)0))
5583 {
5584 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks = -1;
5585 return;
5586 }
5587 dp = (DATA_BL *)(hp->bh_data);
5588 if (dp->db_line_count == 1)
5589 rest = dp->db_txt_end - dp->db_txt_start;
5590 else
5591 rest =
5592 ((dp->db_index[dp->db_line_count - 2]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))))
5593 - dp->db_txt_start;
5594 curchnk->mlcs_totalsize = rest;
5595 curchnk->mlcs_numlines = 1;
5596 curchnk[-1].mlcs_totalsize -= rest;
5597 curchnk[-1].mlcs_numlines -= 1;
5598 }
5599 }
5600 }
5601 else if (updtype == ML_CHNK_DELLINE2)
5602 {
5603 curchnk->mlcs_numlines--;
5604 ml_upd_lastbuf = NULL((void*)0); // Force recalc of curix & curline
5605 if (curix < (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - 1)
5606 && (curchnk->mlcs_numlines + curchnk[1].mlcs_numlines)
5607 <= MLCS_MINL400)
5608 {
5609 curix++;
5610 curchnk = buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix;
5611 }
5612 else if (curix == 0 && curchnk->mlcs_numlines <= 0)
5613 {
5614 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks--;
5615 mch_memmove(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize, buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + 1,memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize), (char *)(buf->
b_ml.ml_chunksize + 1), buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks * sizeof(chunksize_T
))
5616 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks * sizeof(chunksize_T))memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize), (char *)(buf->
b_ml.ml_chunksize + 1), buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks * sizeof(chunksize_T
));
5617 return;
5618 }
5619 else if (curix == 0 || (curchnk->mlcs_numlines > 10
5620 && (curchnk->mlcs_numlines + curchnk[-1].mlcs_numlines)
5621 > MLCS_MINL400))
5622 {
5623 return;
5624 }
5625
5626 // Collapse chunks
5627 curchnk[-1].mlcs_numlines += curchnk->mlcs_numlines;
5628 curchnk[-1].mlcs_totalsize += curchnk->mlcs_totalsize;
5629 buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks--;
5630 if (curix < buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks)
5631 {
5632 mch_memmove(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix,memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (char *)
(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T))
5633 buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1,memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (char *)
(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T))
5634 (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - curix) *memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (char *)
(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T))
5635 sizeof(chunksize_T))memmove((char *)(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix), (char *)
(buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize + curix + 1), (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks
- curix) * sizeof(chunksize_T));
5636 }
5637 return;
5638 }
5639 ml_upd_lastbuf = buf;
5640 ml_upd_lastline = line;
5641 ml_upd_lastcurline = curline;
5642 ml_upd_lastcurix = curix;
5643}
5644
5645/*
5646 * Find offset for line or line with offset.
5647 * Find line with offset if "lnum" is 0; return remaining offset in offp
5648 * Find offset of line if "lnum" > 0
5649 * return -1 if information is not available
5650 */
5651 long
5652ml_find_line_or_offset(buf_T *buf, linenr_T lnum, long *offp)
5653{
5654 linenr_T curline;
5655 int curix;
5656 long size;
5657 bhdr_T *hp;
5658 DATA_BL *dp;
5659 int count; // number of entries in block
5660 int idx;
5661 int start_idx;
5662 int text_end;
5663 long offset;
5664 int len;
5665 int ffdos = (get_fileformat(buf) == EOL_DOS1);
5666 int extra = 0;
5667
5668 // take care of cached line first
5669 ml_flush_line(curbuf);
5670
5671 if (buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks == -1
5672 || buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize == NULL((void*)0)
5673 || lnum < 0)
5674 return -1;
5675
5676 if (offp == NULL((void*)0))
5677 offset = 0;
5678 else
5679 offset = *offp;
5680 if (lnum == 0 && offset <= 0)
5681 return 1; // Not a "find offset" and offset 0 _must_ be in line 1
5682 /*
5683 * Find the last chunk before the one containing our line. Last chunk is
5684 * special because it will never qualify
5685 */
5686 curline = 1;
5687 curix = size = 0;
5688 while (curix < buf->b_ml.ml_usedchunks - 1
5689 && ((lnum != 0
5690 && lnum >= curline + buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines)
5691 || (offset != 0
5692 && offset > size + buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_totalsize
5693 + ffdos * buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines)))
5694 {
5695 curline += buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines;
5696 size += buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_totalsize;
5697 if (offset && ffdos)
5698 size += buf->b_ml.ml_chunksize[curix].mlcs_numlines;
5699 curix++;
5700 }
5701
5702 while ((lnum != 0 && curline < lnum) || (offset != 0 && size < offset))
5703 {
5704 if (curline > buf->b_ml.ml_line_count
5705 || (hp = ml_find_line(buf, curline, ML_FIND0x13)) == NULL((void*)0))
5706 return -1;
5707 dp = (DATA_BL *)(hp->bh_data);
5708 count = (long)(buf->b_ml.ml_locked_high) -
5709 (long)(buf->b_ml.ml_locked_low) + 1;
5710 start_idx = idx = curline - buf->b_ml.ml_locked_low;
5711 if (idx == 0) // first line in block, text at the end
5712 text_end = dp->db_txt_end;
5713 else
5714 text_end = ((dp->db_index[idx - 1]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))));
5715 // Compute index of last line to use in this MEMLINE
5716 if (lnum != 0)
5717 {
5718 if (curline + (count - idx) >= lnum)
5719 idx += lnum - curline - 1;
5720 else
5721 idx = count - 1;
5722 }
5723 else
5724 {
5725#ifdef FEAT_PROP_POPUP
5726 size_t textprop_total = 0;
5727 size_t textprop_size = 0;
5728 char_u *l1, *l2;
5729#endif
5730
5731 extra = 0;
5732 for (;;)
5733 {
5734#ifdef FEAT_PROP_POPUP
5735 if (buf->b_has_textprop)
5736 {
5737 // compensate for the extra bytes taken by textprops
5738 l1 = (char_u *)dp + ((dp->db_index[idx]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))));
5739 l2 = (char_u *)dp + (idx == 0 ? dp->db_txt_end
5740 : ((dp->db_index[idx - 1]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1)))));
5741 textprop_size = (l2 - l1) - (STRLEN(l1)strlen((char *)(l1)) + 1);
5742 }
5743#endif
5744 if (!(offset >= size
5745 + text_end - (int)((dp->db_index[idx]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))))
5746#ifdef FEAT_PROP_POPUP
5747 - (long)(textprop_total + textprop_size)
5748#endif
5749 + ffdos))
5750 break;
5751
5752 if (ffdos)
5753 size++;
5754#ifdef FEAT_PROP_POPUP
5755 textprop_total += textprop_size;
5756#endif
5757 if (idx == count - 1)
5758 {
5759 extra = 1;
5760 break;
5761 }
5762 idx++;
5763 }
5764 }
5765#ifdef FEAT_PROP_POPUP
5766 if (buf->b_has_textprop)
5767 {
5768 int i;
5769
5770 // cannot use the db_index pointer, need to get the actual text
5771 // lengths.
5772 len = 0;
5773 for (i = start_idx; i <= idx; ++i)
5774 len += (int)STRLEN((char_u *)dpstrlen((char *)((char_u *)dp + ((dp->db_index[i]) & (~
((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))))))
5775 + ((dp->db_index[i]) & DB_INDEX_MASK))strlen((char *)((char_u *)dp + ((dp->db_index[i]) & (~
((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1)))))) + 1;
5776 }
5777 else
5778#endif
5779 len = text_end - ((dp->db_index[idx]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1))));
5780 size += len;
5781 if (offset != 0 && size >= offset)
5782 {
5783 if (size + ffdos == offset)
5784 *offp = 0;
5785 else if (idx == start_idx)
5786 *offp = offset - size + len;
5787 else
5788 *offp = offset - size + len
5789 - (text_end - ((dp->db_index[idx - 1]) & DB_INDEX_MASK(~((unsigned)1 << ((sizeof(unsigned) * 8) - 1)))));
5790 curline += idx - start_idx + extra;
5791 if (curline > buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
5792 return -1; // exactly one byte beyond the end
5793 return curline;
5794 }
5795 curline = buf->b_ml.ml_locked_high + 1;
5796 }
5797
5798 if (lnum != 0)
5799 {
5800 // Count extra CR characters.
5801 if (ffdos)
5802 size += lnum - 1;
5803
5804 // Don't count the last line break if 'noeol' and ('bin' or
5805 // 'nofixeol').
5806 if ((!buf->b_p_fixeol || buf->b_p_bin) && !buf->b_p_eol
5807 && lnum > buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
5808 size -= ffdos + 1;
5809 }
5810
5811 return size;
5812}
5813
5814/*
5815 * Goto byte in buffer with offset 'cnt'.
5816 */
5817 void
5818goto_byte(long cnt)
5819{
5820 long boff = cnt;
5821 linenr_T lnum;
5822
5823 ml_flush_line(curbuf); // cached line may be dirty
5824 setpcmark();
5825 if (boff)
5826 --boff;
5827 lnum = ml_find_line_or_offset(curbuf, (linenr_T)0, &boff);
5828 if (lnum < 1) // past the end
5829 {
5830 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
5831 curwin->w_curswant = MAXCOL2147483647;
5832 coladvance((colnr_T)MAXCOL2147483647);
5833 }
5834 else
5835 {
5836 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = lnum;
5837 curwin->w_cursor.col = (colnr_T)boff;
5838 curwin->w_cursor.coladd = 0;
5839 curwin->w_set_curswant = TRUE1;
5840 }
5841 check_cursor();
5842
5843 // Make sure the cursor is on the first byte of a multi-byte char.
5844 if (has_mbyte)
5845 mb_adjust_cursor();
5846}
5847#endif
